text: Balabakholela obwimani, halali olwa oburi bwitsa, alabalola bakhuhenganga, tsimoni tsiabu nitsibotokhana shinga ulia unyiranga nali okhufwa, halali olwa oburi buwa, babasinyisinjia nende tsinimi tsiabu tsindulu, bakholelanga obwimani amakhuwa amalayi, Abo shibasuubila tawe khulwako Nyasaye yarusiaho omurungo kwebikhole biabu, ne ako ni amangu khu Nyasaye
